long_description: Ride like the wind in the men's Castelli Evoluzione Bike Shorts with their exceptional moisture management and engineered fit and performance. New ProDry 2Strati polyester/elastane fabric wicks away sweat and speeds evaporation so you stay drier and more comfortable. Fit-enhancing 8-panel construction. Kiss3 chamois features seamless engineering for chafe-free riding; soft, brushed microfiber top for comfort; and bacteriostatic treatment to help prevent saddle sores. Castelli Evoluzione Bike Shorts feature innovative silicone leg grippers with a clean-edge finish that keep the shorts comfortably in place.
